name: Blade Flourish
description: At 3rd level, whenever you take the Attack action, your walking speed increases by 10 feet until the end of the turn. If a weapon attack hits, you can use one of the following Blade Flourish options: Defensive Flourish (extra damage and added AC), Slashing Flourish (extra damage to the target and another creature within 5 feet), Mobile Flourish (extra damage and push the target away, then move).
